also how do you change the ip is it in the server.class where it say "localhost" ?

item.title: Connection refused Help please! (EasyRsc)
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:2, topic:445352”]As you can see, your connection refuses to cooperate with you. I suggest involving your local government entities as a means to access highly secretive information your computer wishes to not disclose with you. By doing so, you may find yourself needing to start removing hardware from the machine that may be vital, such as the HDD or even the processor from it’s motherboard socket… then and only then you can find the secrets you wish to obtain at the lowest level, where it will have to reveal it’s information.[/quote]The connection was refused because he was probably DDOSing.

Read full topic

item.title: Connection refused Help please! (EasyRsc)
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

As you can see, your connection refuses to cooperate with you. I suggest involving your local government entities as a means to access highly secretive information your computer wishes to not disclose with you. By doing so, you may find yourself needing to start removing hardware from the machine that may be vital, such as the HDD or even the processor from it’s motherboard socket… then and only then you can find the secrets you wish to obtain at the lowest level, where it will have to reveal it’s information.
